- a fantastic little shop placed on the side of the hill on the north side of the bay.  Quite a long but interesting walk from the main part of the village, you are likely to meet sheep and maybe deer on the way. Open from 10am to 6pm daily.
Whisky from the Distilley - there is a shop which sells an extensive selection of it. Also sells soft drinks and ice cream.
